Reviews.Title: Great camera.
Reviews.Author: christina suarez
Reviews.Content: Bought for my 84 y/o grandfather- in- law. Easy to use and for a man who still doesn't use the internet. Not a very exciting camera, but it gets the job done. Thanks!!

Reviews.Title: It sometimes takes pictures and sometimes doesn't.
Reviews.Author: Danielle Jacobs
Reviews.Content: When it does take quality pictures they are wonderful. Sometimes the photos are really blurry and other times the screen is just black. I guess for under $25 what should I expect?

ProductInfo.Name: VIVITAR ViviCam S524 HD Digital Camera 16.1 MP 5x Optical + 4x Digital Zoom
